title: Library News
paragraph: Visit our updates page for brief information about new developments at the library!

title: Celebrating Black History
paragraph: Visit our new online exhibit celebrating Black history at the U of I, created in collaboration with the Black History Research Lab.

title: New Ella Fitzgerald Digital Collection
paragraph: Celebrate Jazz History and the Lionel Hampton Jazz Festival by exploring Ella Fitzgerald's iconic fashion pieces.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
